item.title: Subscribe to the Newsletter
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description:
Subscribe to stay updated with new posts from me! Why? It’s free. This is a hobby, not a business. And maybe, just maybe, I’ll have something interesting to say that you find some entertainment from.

What You’ll Get

  • Email notifications for every new blog post
  • No spam, just questionable quality content
  • Unsubscribe anytime

Listmonk is a free and open-source self-hosted newsletter service hosted from my own private server. Your email will only be used for this newsletter, nothing more, as I respect your need and want to privacy.

item.title: I Hate AI, but Kind of Love It
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: I break down my love/hate relationship with AI and how people just suck.

item.title: Are New Developers Caught in the Crosshairs of Today's Gamers?
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: Watching news about the developer Build a Rocket Boy about their apparently horrible game MindsEye got me wondering if us gamers have become too damn critical… No, no we haven’t.

item.title: Final Space- A Rough Gem in a Sea of Mediocrity
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: After finishing the series I had to come share my thoughts and criticisms of a fantastic show that I believe more people need to see.

item.title: Modernity is Safe, but Very Boring
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: I cover the things that I see and witness over time that seem to change from having its own identity to one that is almost unmistakably the same as another.

item.title: Out of Time or Just Getting Old
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: I briefly cover some thoughts of mine about hobbies and its association with aging.

item.title: Before You Buy- Mechwarrior 5 Clans
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: A quick and dirty rundown of Mechwarrior 5: Clans after its intial release; not eloquent nor professional in the slightest.

item.title: What is Minecraft to People
item.author: justirish.insignificant@proton.me (Just_Irish / Sean R.)
item.description: After revisiting Minecraft once again I had some thoughts about the growth and major changes that Minecraft had over the years that, in my opinion, were to the detriment to the game.

item.description: A quick and dirty rundown of The Forever Winter after its intial release into early access; not eloquent nor professional in the slightest.
